name: James Collins
description: Am a Man of One Woman that believe in what Goes Around Comes Around.im Looking forward to meet that Special Woman that i will try and Create Heaven In Her Heart…Someone that is Honest,Caring,Trustworthy,Lovely,Romantic.. A Woman that as Goals, Dreams and also know what she want in life with a great sense of humor.i need someone that will smile at me whenever i do silly things and also a woman that i can show my Affection In Public..Kiss Her Lips and also Hold Her Close To Me day and Nite..A Woman that will Walk towards Me and i will Start telling my Friends Thats Her..The Woman that Own The key To Me Heart…I Really know what i want in life and i will try and do all my best to give what i want and also belong to me..Well. I Want you to know that life is full of ups and down and everything that happen in life as a reason..well i have been lonely for all my life because i have been looking for that special woman that will love me with all her heart.. am spending my life and time alone..and i need a woman that i can wake up in the morning and tell her that she is the most beautiful woman in the whole world…Let her know that she own the key to my Heart……i have a sister name sharon but she is a disable she is dump and deaf but she is married with two kids name anderson and donald i am willing to get back to relocate to tx or i can relocate with the right woman i met on this online stuff but i hope i met you baby and could spend the rest of my life with
